title: This trait/skill is unique per gamemode

comments.author: Legendary Dragonus.9734
comments.body:
Hello!

Since PvP/WvW/PvE got their skills/traits splitted into different versions, ingame we have the fact “This trait/skill is unique per gamemode”.

It seems to me that endpoints like profession/specializations only return the PvE skill ids. Is there the possibility to get the ids for other gamemodes returned as well?
